channel.title: Adding snow to devolution...? (Need badly...)
channel.description: In game, I can make it so, if the player types ::snow, it gives snow, but, I want it to do it automatically....The problem is(or so I think)...there is no weather handler...I need help with this, so if you know how, please help, I would appreciate it a lot!
